title: Issue templates with multiple textareas have multiple file upload fields that can disappear

labels.name: topic/ui
labels.description: Change the appearance of the Gitea UI

body:
### Description

When a issue template has multiple textareas, each of them have their own area for uploading files. However, once you click away from one of the textareas, the file upload field disappears.

Steps to reproduce:
- Deploy a Gitea instance
- Create a repository on your Gitea instance
- In your repository in the directory `.gitea/issue_template/` add this yaml file (you will need to rename it from `.txt` to `.yaml`): [test_template.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/21326733/test_template.txt)
- Now in the `Issues` section of your repository, create a new issue and select the template we added in the previous step.
  - This template can be accessed on your demo site [here](https://gitea.com/Alaska-001/Bug-report-template-test/issues/new?template=.gitea%2fissue_template%2ftest_template.yaml), or on the Blender foundation's Gitea instance [here](https://projects.blender.org/Alaska/bug-report-testing/issues/new?template=.gitea%2fissue_template%2ftest_template.yaml)
- Notice there are two text area inputs. Upload a file to the first textarea. This works correctly.
- Now click on the second textarea and notice the file you previously uploaded disappears from the UI. This is unexpected, and I personally believe it's a bug.

### Screenshots

Here's a video demonstrating the issue on the demo website: https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/903ec6bc-68f8-425f-a6eb-109bd5a90e11

### Gitea Version

1.25+dev-301-g7413e8583d

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

### Operating System

Windows

### Browser Version

Google Chrome 138.0.7204.97
